name: @whtg/harvest-auto
description: 一键导入日报到Harvest的CLI工具，支持命令行及require引入

scripts.import-csv: node -e "const Harvest = require('./harvest-automation.js'); const h = new Harvest(process.env.HARVEST_TOKEN, process.env.HARVEST_ACCOUNT_ID); h.importFromCSV(process.argv[2])"
scripts.import-json: node -e "const Harvest = require('./harvest-automation.js'); const h = new Harvest(process.env.HARVEST_TOKEN, process.env.HARVEST_ACCOUNT_ID); h.importFromJSON(process.argv[2])"

author: Your Name
